001package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
002
003import java.awt.color.ColorSpace;
004
005import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
006
007public abstract class CustomColorSpace extends ColorSpace {
008        static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
009        
010        protected CustomColorSpace(int type, int numcomponents) {
011                super(type, numcomponents);
012        }
013
014        // new ColorSpace methods using double values only
015        public abstract double[] toCIEXYZ(double[] value);
016        public abstract double[] fromCIEXYZ(double[] value);
017        public abstract double[] toRGB(double[] value);
018        public abstract double[] fromRGB(double[] value);
019        
020        public float[] toCIEXYZ(float[] value) {
021                return Matrix.toFloat(toCIEXYZ(Matrix.toDouble(value)));
022        }
023        
024        public float[] fromCIEXYZ(float[] value) {
025                return Matrix.toFloat(fromCIEXYZ(Matrix.toDouble(value)));
026        }
027        
028        public float[] toRGB(float[] value) {
029                return Matrix.toFloat(toRGB(Matrix.toDouble(value)));
030        }
031        
032        public float[] fromRGB(float[] value) {
033                return Matrix.toFloat(fromRGB(Matrix.toDouble(value)));
034        }
035
036}
